trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_1<tab>You'd better be an adventurer after an elite mark, or I'll have none of you.
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Gatling)
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Maahes)
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Lampalagua)
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_10<tab>A silly kind of thing to ask a busy man! I hunt elite marks. That's obvious enough.
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_11<tab>If the gods are good and your aim is true, you shall be paid a bounty in Allied Seals.
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_12<tab>I'll tell you what I know of the marks, but tarry not! We all have things to kill today.

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_13<tab>My days are full of hunts, of course. Why, just yesterday I slew a rank A mark. The danger of a mark is so ranked: B, then A, and finally the dread yet elusive S.
TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_20<tab>“Gatling. A hedgemole of exceptionally bad temper who makes free with the lichyard of the Church of Saint Adama Landama.

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_21<tab>“He has been thus dubbed for taking up residence in the tomb of Gatling the Alchemical Smith. If the creature has a true name, it remains unknown and of no great interest to local folk.”

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_30<tab>“While Halatali is a cultural institution of note, it has also been less than perfect in keeping track of the fighting beasts it starves into greater savagery.

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_31<tab>“Maahes is an object lesson. The blood meant for spilling on stadium sands has instead grown richer, feeding on the flesh of caravaneers.”

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_40<tab>“Lampalagua. A dragon of many heads, cage-born and stadium-bred. His escape en route to the Coliseum was a major embarrassment for his handlers, or more precisely, to their heirs.

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_41<tab>“Each head having been blooded as a hatchling, Lampalagua is exceptionally barbarous and exquisitely attuned to the bloodlust of the crowd.

TEXT_REGWILNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00191_MOBHUNTERW1F3_000_42<tab>“Lacking a conventional audience in the wilds of eastern Thanalan, Lampalagua has instead taken to appearing wherever violent business is afoot.”
